id-57385.title: Gift Shop
id-57385.post-content:
The Gift Shop template is a light, bright and welcoming website template ideal for gift shops, sweet shops, confectioners and anyone who wants to portray a vibrant personality. The design is colorful, engaging and provides lots of opportunities to promote your products.

The Gift Shop template includes impactful headers and calls to action, lots of space to showcase product categories and individual products and highlight special offers. It integrates seamlessly with WooCommerce too, so building your store is a breeze!

Key features of the Gift Shop template

  • Colorful website template for online stores
  • Lots of areas for products and special offers
  • Lots of whitespace as relief from the color
  • Product and category pages included
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-57385.post-excerpt: Colorful web template ideal for selling fun items, online stores and more

id-46704.title: e-Book Author
id-46704.post-content:
The eBook Author template is a calm, composed website template with a large area above the fold to promote your latest book. There are more opportunities promote your work further down the page as well as individual pages for books and any other publications.

The template has been well-designed and keeps things light and accessible, with a professional air. There is a lot of whitespace with plenty of content areas for you to tell your story and share your work. It’s an excellent template for promotion.

Key features of the eBook Author template

  • Well-designed template for publishers and authors
  • Nice layout with whitespace and content areas
  • Attractive header for your latest book
  • Extra pages and sections for other books
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-46704.post-excerpt: Well-designed web template for promoting books, authors and publishers

id-19494.title: BBQ Restaurant
id-19494.post-content:
The BBQ Restaurant template makes an instant impact with a video header overlaid with sympathetic fonts. It sets the scene immediately and is backed up by a great color scheme, mix of serif and sans serif fonts and plenty of content areas.

The entire website template has been well thought-out, with lots of space for images, a menu, graphics, descriptions and a booking form. Both the menu and contact pages are particularly good, which should help increase the number of bookings you get.

Key features of the BBQ Restaurant template

  • Striking video header sets the scene instantly
  • Lots of relevant content areas including menu and booking
  • Great mix of colors and fonts
  • Attractive extra pages relevant to the restaurant niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-19494.post-excerpt: Impactful web template for restaurants, eateries and new food businesses

id-21828.title: Health Coach
id-21828.post-content:
The Health Coach template has a fantastic design with bright colors, an illustrative header image, bright contrast color and plenty of whitespace around content areas. It’s ideal for fitness, health, wellness and associated businesses.

The homepage is instantly engaging, with clear messaging, attractive graphics and elements designed for health coaches. Everything can be tweaked for other fitness or wellness businesses using a drag and drop page builder. It’s too good a template not to use!

Key features of the Health Coach template

  • Fantastic design with engaging colors and fonts
  • Designed around the health and wellness niche
  • Lots of content areas on the homepage and supplementary pages
  • Complementing colors for calls to action and graphics
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-21828.post-excerpt: Vibrant health and wellness template that engages instantly and draws you in

id-18191.title: Plant Shop
id-18191.post-content:
The Plant Shop template has an authentic feel reminiscent of a nursery, florist or store that sells plants. The homepage opens with a large image of a houseplant, with a simple headline and call to action.

The rest of the page showcases your products using calm colors, a simple layout and lots of images to show as well as tell. It’s an effective store template that integrates with WooCommerce to deliver an easy to use store that actively encourages people to browse and buy.

Key features of the Plant Shop template

  • Attractive eCommerce store template for plants
  • Modern design with plenty of customization options
  • Effective product and category listing sections
  • Conversion-oriented product pages
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-18191.post-excerpt: Conversion-oriented eCommerce template for plant stores and nursery businesses

id-46009.title: Painter
id-46009.post-content:
The Painter template is a bright, engaging design that opens with a large header, handwritten and modern fonts and lots of bright images. It’s a very creative web template that fits the artist and painter niche perfectly.

The template includes alternating colored and light backgrounds with textured images, bright contrast colors and flowing layout. Complementary pages all reflect the core design, with different colors to indicate different purposes while looking and feeling similar.

Key features of the Painter template

  • Bright, colorful design perfect for painters and artists
  • Flowing layout that encourages you to explore
  • Strong images to help showcase your work
  • Extra pages including a portfolio
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-46009.post-excerpt: Colorful website template for artists, creatives and painters to show their work

id-19540.title: Yoga Instructor
id-19540.post-content:
The Yoga Instructor template is a light, accessible design with a relaxed feel ideal for the wellness niche. It has a light fullscreen image with a yoga pose and engaging headline text. The rest of the design uses plenty of whitespace and a nice pink contrast color.

The page uses lovely graphics to showcase services and includes flexible content areas where you can share your passion and engage your audience with storytelling. All backed up by subtle calls to action and an attractive contact page.

Key features of the Yoga Instructor template

  • Relaxed design that works for the yoga niche
  • Light layout with plenty of whitespace
  • Flexible content areas
  • Contact form included with the template
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-19540.post-excerpt: Relaxed web template ideal for yoga instructors and wellness business owners
